EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_IDC_Cloud Architecture_Q216.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Pivotal sponsored IDC Technology Spotlight, Transformation in the Age of the 3rd Platform: The Role of Cloud Architecture. We hope you find it informative and useful!
If you are interested in this and similar topics, please consider joining your fellow technologists at the SpringOne Platform Conference <[[http://springoneplatform.io/]]> in Las Vegas from August 1 to 4, 2016. The conference will include technical sessions, customer presentations, and general awesomeness on a variety of topics including continuous integration and delivery, reactive programming, and building microservices. Spend time with technologists and developers from some of the world's most innovative and well-known companies like Netflix, PayPal, The Home Depot, NBC Universal, and Google. Check out the session catalog here <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/schedule/sessions]]>.
Best,
The Pivotal Team
